alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 6:44PM EST until December 01 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Strongest wind gusts will be felt in the notches and in the areas immediately downslope of the mountains, where isolated gusts to near 50 mph cannot be ruled out. * WHERE...In Maine, Central Somerset, Northern Franklin, Northern Oxford, and Southern Oxford Counties. In New Hampshire, Northern Carroll, Northern Grafton, and Southern Coos Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects including holiday decorations.

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Oxford
